channel.title: How to make items 'donator only' [317] Delta
channel.description: Hello, I got an item which the code for it is, 9119. It is buyable via the donator shop, but I don't want non-donators to be able to equip it if they happen to 'pk' it, I have no idea what code I should add and I tried searching for 'donator only items' ect.. no results. Please help.

item.title: How to make items 'donator only' [317] Delta
item.dc:creator: @jaspertjeoo jaspertjeoo
item.description:
@jaspertjeoo wrote:

search for
public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {
under that place

if(wearID == **** && donator == 0) { // Replace **** with the item ID
sM(“YOU MUST BE A DONATOR THIS WEAR THIS…W/E IT IS.”);
return false;
}

Read full topic
